1.png.action: go up 1 meter — bad action - lost target
1.png.description: The TV is visible at the bottom of the image. Moving up will help center it vertically in the frame.
The TV is partially visible on the right side of the image. Moving right will help center the TV in the frame.

2.png.action: target lost — return to previous position and try a different direction
2.png.description: The TV is not visible in the current image.

3.png.description: The TV is visible at the bottom of the image. Moving down will help center it vertically and bring it closer.

4.png.description: The TV is visible on the right side of the image. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the TV while keeping it in view.

5.png.description: The TV is visible on the right side of the image, but it is positioned higher than the center. Moving down will help center the TV vertically in the frame.

6.png.description: The TV is clearly visible and centered in the frame. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

7.png.description: The TV is partially visible on the right side of the image. Moving right will help center the TV in the frame and bring it closer.

8.png.description: The TV is clearly visible and centered in the frame. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

9.png.description: The TV is partially visible on the right side of the image. Moving right will help center the TV in the frame.

10.png.description: The TV is partially visible on the right side of the image. Moving right will help center the TV in the frame.

11.png.description: The TV is clearly visible, takes up a significant portion of the image, and appears extremely close with clear details and well-defined edges. No further movement is necessary.
